txt.en: Edash is located in Amd√¢n.\n\nBring the arrows and pouches to Edash.
'Good, good. You have brought me many samples. We must work quickly if we are to save their lives.'

'A strange and fell ailment has befallen our soldiers. Even the smallest wound has left them stricken by some unnatural illness. I suspect poison is to blame, but I need more of the foul stuff to study. Time is pressing down on our brethren, so you must hurry.\n\n'Make your way to Rung-shakam and gather samples of the poison. Check their arrows and look for pouches of the stuff. It dries quickly and flakes into powder, so I suspect they must carry it with them into battle. Anything you might do to thin their ranks will also help.'
When a mysterious ailment strikes down multiple soldiers, the healer Edash suspects poison.
Rung-shakam is located in north-western Azanulbizar.\n\nYou should collect poisoned arrows and poison pouches in Rung-shakam.
